Name: Dataverse project
Comments: Dataverse is an open source web application to share, preserve, cite, explore and analyse research data

Name: Digital Commons
Comments: Hosted OAI-PMH compliant insitutional repository platform

Name: EPrints
Comments: Open source (GPL) software for building OAI-PMH compliant open access repositories

Name: FAIRDOMHub
Comments: The FAIRDOMHub is built upon the SEEK software suite, which is an open source web platform for sharing scientific research assets, processes and outcomes

Name: Figshare
Comments: Commercial online digital repository adhering to the open data principle

Name: Galaxy
Comments: Galaxy is an open, web-based platform for accessible, reproducible, and transparent computational research.

Name: Haplo
Comments: Open source platform for information applications. Haplo provides the complete stack, from database to user interface

Name: IBM Spectrum Scale
Comments: IBM Spectrum Scale meets these challenges as a high-performance solution for managing data at scale with the distinctive ability to perform archive and analytics in place.

Name: Invenio
Comments: Open source (GPL) software suite used to run online document repositories developed by CERN

Name: Islandora
Comments: Open source (GPL) digital repository software based on the Fedora framework and drupal

Name: ReDBox
Comments: Open source RDM platform that assists researchers and institutions to plan, create and publish their research data assets

Name: Samvera (Hydra)
Comments: Open source (Apache 2) repository environment based on Fedora framework and Ruby on Rails

Name: Zenodo
Comments: Open source (GPL) sharing and preservation layer for Invenio
